official_title: A resolution authorizing Representative Helstoski to appear as a witness before the Grand Jury of the United States District Court for the District of New Jersey, to testify on October 14, which has been continued until December 19, 1975.

summary.text: Authorizes Representative Helstoski to appear as a witness before the Grand Jury of the United States District Court for the District of New Jersey, to testify on October 14, 1975, which has been continued until December 19, 1975.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing Representative Helstoski to appear as a witness before the Grand Jury of the United States District Court for the District of New Jersey, to testify on October 14, which has been continued until December 19, 1975.
